original_text: And the Lord opened the mouth of the ass, and she said unto Balaam, What have I done unto thee, that thou hast smitten me these three times?
korean_text: 여호와께서 나귀 입을 여시니 발람에게 이르되 내가 당신에게 무엇을 하였기에 나를 이같이 세 번을 때리느냐

sentences.original_text: And the Lord opened the mouth of the ass
What have I done unto thee
that thou hast smitten me these three times?
sentences.korean_translation: 당신이 나를 이 세 번을 쳤나이까?
